definitions.definition: an organization intended to protect and develop an art, science, language, etc., or a school that teaches a particular subject or trains people for a particular job:
the part of a football club that trains young players who might one day become part of the first team :
examples: The youth academy starts training talented young players from the age of eight.

definitions.definition: a school in the UK that is not controlled by the local authority and receives its money directly from the central government
